main event: An unidentified flying object was reported in the vicinity of Van Leer, Tennessee on December 12, 1958.
interesting points: The UFO was described as a brown-gold object resembling the size of a baseball with a bright light and no sound., The object was observed to break up and enter clouds., Two witnesses aged 26 and 74 reported the sighting., The incident was evaluated by the technical library and deemed significant., The report indicates the investigation lacked additional data due to the uncertain date of the incident.
sighted object: brown-gold-colored object with a bright light
